beneficiary_focus: local communities in Sussex; projects addressing health, environment, employment, social isolation
restrictions: Must benefit communities within Sussex; Organisations outside Sussex are not eligible
notes: Applicants must deliver projects or services that benefit people living in Sussex. Funding is available for core costs, projects, and services.
